trans-unit.source: A systemic classification of financial statement (FS) items that belong together.

seg-source.mrk: A systemic classification of financial statement (FS) items that belong together.

target.mrk: 相關財務報表 (FS) 項目的系統分類。

trans-unit.source: Enter a consolidation chart of accounts (COA) to filter for your financial statement items.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a consolidation chart of accounts (COA) to filter for your financial statement items.

target.mrk: 輸入合併報表會計科目表 (COA) 來篩選財務報表項目。

trans-unit.source: The consolidation COA is a systemic classification of financial statement (FS) items that belong together. This classification is marked by either corporate external or internal requirements (or both). For example, you could have one consolidation COA for the purpose of generating financial statements to meet the requirements of statutory authorities, and you could have another consolidation COA to accommodate corporate-internal requirements for contribution margin accounting.

seg-source.mrk: The consolidation COA is a systemic classification of financial statement (FS) items that belong together.
This classification is marked by either corporate external or internal requirements (or both).

For example, you could have one consolidation COA for the purpose of generating financial statements to meet the requirements of statutory authorities, and you could have another consolidation COA to accommodate corporate-internal requirements for contribution margin accounting.

target.mrk: 合併報表會計科目表 (COA) 為共同所屬相關財務報表 (FS) 項目的系統分類。
公司外部或內部需求 (或兩者) 會標記此分類。
舉例來說，為了符合法定主管機關的規定，您可能會有一個合併報表 COA 專門產生財務報表，且另有一個合併報表 COA 用來容納邊際利潤會計的公司內部需求。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the consolidation COA, see <xref keyref="loio1b1d2ae273de4b6f9b2041d6205e3ec0"/>.

seg-source.mrk: To learn more about the consolidation COA, see <xref keyref="loio1b1d2ae273de4b6f9b2041d6205e3ec0"/>.

target.mrk: 若要深入瞭解合併報表 COA，請參閱：<xref keyref="loio1b1d2ae273de4b6f9b2041d6205e3ec0"/>。
